app_descript:
Twiny - Find your twins

Twiny is an innovative social app that celebrates the joy of shared birthdays! Designed to connect individuals born on the same day and month, it fosters instant connections and paves the way for lasting friendships. With Twiny, you can explore a global community where you can find your birthday twin and embrace the beauty of human connections. Discover your twin today and join in the celebration!
